title: Academy
content: Exquisite food created by Ulster's talented students who are committed to careers in hospitality, as chefs, entrepreneurs and future leaders.

title: Main Reception
content: Visit the main reception to get your student card renewed or if you have a general enquiry about the campus.

title: UUSU Bar
content: CQ Social - Food & Bar: Mon - Fri 10am - 10pm, Weekends 11:30am - 9pm Keep up to date with what's happening uusu.org

title: Block BC
content: Employability and Careers are here to help students develop the right skills and confidence for the future. They offer the Ulster EDGE Award, an award to complete alongside a degree that helps build  skills through different activities.  They also provide lots of support to help students gain the relevant work experience and placements. This includes events on campus and virtually through the Handshake platform that help connect with employers and opportunities.

title: Frederick Street Car Park
content:
• 350 Permit Access only car parking spaces with 18 designated as accessible spaces
  • 7 spaces equipped with Electric Vehicle charging points
  • 10 motorcycle spaces
  • 193 secure bicycle storage racks

title: Student Accommodation
content: Living in UU's student accommodation gives you exclusive access to activities, events and trips that help you to settle in and make new friends. Do you know that you have access to 24/7 support? Whatever you need, the team are ready to support you.

title: UU Sport
content: Sport is a big part of life at Ulster and there is something to suit all levels and interests. Why not try a class with your friends or give the gym a go? The facilities offer affordable student rates

title: The Shop BSOA
content: Indulge in one-off creative pieces lovingly made by UU students

title: Digital Services
content: This is your go-to team for IT support both on-campus and from home. Our online ‘Student Experience’ page provides information on all our services including a ‘Getting Started’ area with guidance on the technology you need for online learning, how to access your email, the Student Portal, managing your password securely, and most importantly...how to get help!

title: Safe Zone
content: Peace of mind in your pocket - feel safe on campus 24/7 with our free app. By installing the SafeZone app and registering as a user, you will also receive any critical security notifications from the University. We encourage all students to download this app to stay up to date whilst on campus.

title: Changing Places/Toilets
content: Changing Places toilets are larger accessible toilets for severely disabled people, with equipment such as hoists, curtains, adult-sized changing benches and space for carers and can found on each campus.

title: Food Outlet
content:
• The Junction Food Hall Block BC Ground Floor
  • Streetbeats Block BC Ground Floor
  • AromaRoma Block BC Ground Floor
  • Cathedral Quarter Social @UUSU Belfast Block BC Ground Floor
  • The Point Block BC Level 03
  • VERT Block BC Level 06
  • York Street Coffee Block BD Ground Floor
  • Paul & Henry Block BB Level 02 (At Link Bridge)
  • HJEM Block BA Ground Floor

title: Lecture Theatre
content:

  • Block BC Level 02
  • Block BC Level 01
  • Orpheus Lecture Theatre Block BD Level 2
  • Metropole Lecture Theatre Block BD Level 2

title: Electric Charging Point
content: In Fredrick Street carpark there are 7 spaces equipped with Electric Vehicle charging points

title: Pay Point
content: You can pay for parking via card and cash at the dedicated pay point machines

title: Transport
content: To plan your journey to campus via bus or rail

title: Transport
content:
Curtis Street Carpark has 36 cycle racks (including secure lockers to store your cycling gear, activated by your student or staff ID Card)

Frederick Street Car Park has 193 cycle racks (secure lockers installed Autumn 2022

title: Block Name
content: Room names are stated as block - floor - room number ie BA-03-10

title: Building Entrance
content: Access each block via any of the entrances
